metadata.Title: CVE-2022-34169 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The Apache Xalan Java XSLT library is vulnerable to an integer truncation issue when processing malicious XSLT stylesheets. This can be used to corrupt Java class files generated by the internal XSLTC compiler and execute arbitrary Java bytecode. Users are recommended to update to version 2.7.3 or later. Note: Java runtimes (such as OpenJDK) include repackaged copies of Xalan.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-34169` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

openjdk-17-demo - 17.0.4+8-1~20.04
openjdk-17-jdk - 17.0.4+8-1~20.04
openjdk-17-jdk-headless - 17.0.4+8-1~20.04
openjdk-17-jre - 17.0.4+8-1~20.04
openjdk-17-jre-headless - 17.0.4+8-1~20.04
openjdk-17-jre-zero - 17.0.4+8-1~20.04
openjdk-17-source - 17.0.4+8-1~20.04
No subscription required

openjdk-8-demo - 8u342-b07-0ubuntu1~20.04
openjdk-8-jdk - 8u342-b07-0ubuntu1~20.04
openjdk-8-jdk-headless - 8u342-b07-0ubuntu1~20.04
openjdk-8-jre - 8u342-b07-0ubuntu1~20.04
openjdk-8-jre-headless - 8u342-b07-0ubuntu1~20.04
openjdk-8-jre-zero - 8u342-b07-0ubuntu1~20.04
openjdk-8-source - 8u342-b07-0ubuntu1~20.04
No subscription required

openjdk-11-demo - 11.0.16+8-0ubuntu1~20.04
openjdk-11-jdk - 11.0.16+8-0ubuntu1~20.04
openjdk-11-jdk-headless - 11.0.16+8-0ubuntu1~20.04
openjdk-11-jre - 11.0.16+8-0ubuntu1~20.04
openjdk-11-jre-headless - 11.0.16+8-0ubuntu1~20.04
openjdk-11-jre-zero - 11.0.16+8-0ubuntu1~20.04
openjdk-11-source - 11.0.16+8-0ubuntu1~20.04
No subscription required

notes.Note: leosilva> bug is mostly in bcel and java. There is no fix in xalan what   leosilva> it seems.

criterions.comment: libxalan2-java package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
openjdk-13: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'superseded by openjdk-17').
openjdk-16: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'superseded by openjdk-17').
openjdk-17 package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '17.0.4+8-1~20.04').
openjdk-8 package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '8u342-b07-0ubuntu1~20.04').
openjdk-lts package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '11.0.16+8-0ubuntu1~20.04').
